snippet: Utah has voted Republican by at least 19 percentage points in every presidential election since 1964, and the FiveThirtyEight forecast gives Mr. Romney a 100 percent chance of winning the state.
abstract: Utah has voted Republican by at least 19 percentage points in every presidential election since 1964, and the FiveThirtyEight forecast gives Mr. Romney a 100 percent chance of winning the state.

headline.main: Utah: Very Republican, but Not Quite as Conservative as It Appears
